amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments numbered 20, 36, 37, 39, 48, 49, 52, 53, 59, and 63 printed in House Report 114-571. See page D538 of the Congressional Record of May 18, 2016 for description of en bloc amendments.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments numbered 20, 36, 37, 39, 48, 49, 52, 53, 59, and 63 printed in House Report 114-571.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A027) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
